pages.text: $(l)Stats$()$(li)Price: Not Sold$(li)Milk: Buffalo Milk$(li)Milk Cooldown: 1 day$(li)Drops: Bison Meat, Leather, Bison Horn$(br2)$(l)Notes$()$(br)Found in taiga biomes. Will instinctively attack nearby players, even at high affection.
Bison are temperamental and highly distrustful due to poaching.
